Trade/Device Name(s): MAJOR Level I/Level II Control Solution
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for AP-1000 Blood Glucose Monitoring System utilizing electrochemical biosensor technology for quantitative glucose measurement in fresh capillary whole blood
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertips, for home (OTC) or clinical use by persons with diabetes or healthcare professionals as an aid to monitor diabetes control; not for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use
